Class UserSetups

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.UserSetups

  • public class UserSetups
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for saving, loading and handling setup board grids.
    Author:
    Henrik

        public void removeListeners(Pawn[][] userSetupGrid)
        Removes ActionListeners & MouseListeners from all pawn-objects of a board grid. If not done, the board grid will not be serializable.

        userSetupGrid -
